Released on 15 May 2023.  Full update 2023.
The version 6.0 of the database contains new data (identifed as V6.0 in the version variable) collected primarely in 2022. See Metadata tab for more details.

Released on 31 Jan 2024. 
This new dataset does not contain additional data or new countries. The data have been further analyzed and processed by WHO to ensure quality and consistency.
